subtitle: Instead of the ever popular Pork with Calvados try this tasty alternative using Benedictine.

method.text: Soak the prunes for 1 days in half the Benedictine.
Place the chops in an ovenproof dish in the oven for approx 15 min, until browned all over.
Remove from oven. Baste with the other glass of Benedictine. Reduce oven temperature to 190°C.
Carefully flambe the chops, and return to oven for about 1 hour. 10 min before the end of the cooking time, arrange the prunes around the meat and finish cooking.

title: Pork loin chops with prunes
